channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OK

item.title: Report X-2024020012
item.description:
Report X-2024020012

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-23
  • City: OKLAHOMA CITY
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: BOX WAS FOUND TO BE LEAKING DURING TRAILER UNLOADING, RESPONDER CALLED FOR. RESPONDER RESPONDED AND TRANSPORTED TO BE PROCESSED. RESPONDER DISCOVERED LEAKAGE CAME FROM CAP.

item.title: Report E-2024010505
item.description:
Report E-2024010505

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-02T00:33:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-16
  • City: WILSON
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: EAGLE TRANSPORT CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Pump on 9095 was leaking. Mr. Rollerson was dressed in his PPE and was investigating the cause of the leak when he knocked the hose from the pump. The customers tank valve was open, causing xylene to pour on the parking lot. Xylene spilled on the parking lot. Estimate 30 gallons. Cleanup managed by customer & they invoiced us.
